Title: DeLonghi Maestosa Coffee Maker, La Specialista espresso machine
Comments: what i liked about this model is that it doe not have an onboard clock mybest kitchen i live in my rv where the 120v go off and on often a i move around so it wa impossible to set the clock therefore it came on or went off at odd time this one doe not have the temperature setting either so it is a little hotter than i wa used to i drink 5 6 cup of coffee a day caf and decaf different flavor a reliable k cup machine is perfect for me and my lifestyle arthur you are a legend delonghi is lucky to have a barista like you take u through their range great video cheer euros3 000 for that machine and the material are plastic buy an espresso machine and separate grinder and make these thing yourself it is mostly metal that thing is built like a tank compared to other machine sure it is expensive but that is worth it for let is say an office with 5 10 people who want to drink a bunch of coffee at work just a one click and all is automatic even the whole milk and chocolate milk part perhaps also family that need 4 coffee and 2 chocolate milk per day it start to make sense maybe surprisingly enjoyable video it is a pleasure to watch people talk about their passion the guy asking the question is a dick can it mix the bean from the two grinder to make a coffee blend well kinda late answer for you i think but no you only can choose between grinder 1 or 2 in the app i love german they say the most obvious boring straightforward thing like it is a dirty rude brothel activity delonghi maestosa 5percent ozon194aff  2 5k for a coffee machine damn thats some exclusive price ausguy505 thanks for the update and stay safe a well steviebboy69 it still dollar5k so nothing much ha changed in price or lockdown lol stay safe ausguy505 you are not wrong there it is expensive i have not checked the current price a i commented quite a while ago there have been many lockdown for sure try the jura brand craziness can it run crysis fancy kettle
